Strings.Text: There is a bottle of medicine on \nthe bed. {pause}{clear}The inside cannot be seen with \nall the dust covering it.{pause}
A small dead dinosaur is inside \nall dried up. {pause}{clear}The cage is locked. \nYou cannot open it.{pause}
It's a medicine cabinet. The inside \nhas been messed with and there {pause}{clear}is nothing which appears to be \nusable.{pause}
The captured dinosaur is inside.{pause}
There is a bottle of medicine on \nthe bed. {pause}{clear}The inside cannot be seen with \nall the dust covering it.{pause}
On the table are a few \nspecimens and a microscope.{pause}
It is a folding bed.{pause}
The jungle vegetation has \nintruded inside by forcing {pause}{clear}through the wall.{pause}
The jungle vegetation has \nintruded inside by forcing {pause}{clear}through the wall.{pause}
It's a terminal used by the \ndoctor. It won't power. {pause}{clear}There is no way to know what \nkind of data is stored here.{pause}
It's a terminal used by the \ndoctor. It won't power. {pause}{clear}There is no way to know what \nkind of data is stored here.{pause}
A dinosaur has built a nest here. \nBetter not to disturb it.{pause}
It's a terminal to open and close \nthe ventilation hole.{pause}{clear}Will you operate the terminal?{0x3000}
It's a terminal to open and close \nthe ventilation hole.{pause}{clear}Will you operate the terminal?{0x3000}
It's a terminal to open and close \nthe ventilation hole.{pause}{clear}Will you operate the terminal?{0x3000}
It's an open cage. {pause}{clear}You can use it as a trap to \ncapture small animals.{pause}
There's something else in the \ncage. {pause}{clear}You found a new DINO FILE.{pause}
The cage is unlocked. {pause}{clear}For some reason there is a metal \nspoon placed inside the cage.{pause}{clear}Will you open the cage?{0x3000}
The captured dinosaur is inside.{pause}
{delay 28692}The Mission Data has been \nupdated.{pause}
